post.description:
Generate a new wallet address or retrieve an existing one for prime wallet.

Addresses can only be generated for recharge coins.

post.description:
Withdraw funds from prime wallet to an external address. To estimate the withdrawal fee, use the [Fee Estimate](/reference/feecontroller_estimatefee) endpoint.

The **network fee** is automatically deducted from the specified amount, and the remaining balance is sent to the receiver

post.description: Estimate the withdrawal fee for a specific transaction.
Enables trading functionality on a specific wallet or sub-wallet.
Reconcile wallet or sub-wallet balances with system records to ensure accurate asset data.
Check the validity of a blockchain address.

get.description: Retrieve a list of currencies that support both `deposit` and `withdrawal` operations. You can only deposit funds into and withdraw funds from the `currencies` listed in this response. Other currencies are supported exclusively for `trading` (spot and futures) but do not support `deposit or withdrawal functionalities`.

parameters.name: coin
parameters.description: The `token` name

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: The `chain` name

balance.description: The available balance for withdrawal or transactions

frozen.description: The balance that is temporarily frozen (e.g., for orders)

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the address was created
